mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS recordCount FROM API_NEWS_RESULT ANR, API_NEWS AN

SELECT TB.IMG_FILES, TB.NM_IMG_FILES FROM ( SELECT IMG_FILES, NM_IMG_FILES, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DT_FRT DESC ) AS RNUM FROM API_NEWS_FILE_INFO WHERE SEQ_NEWS = #{seq_news, jdbcType = NUMERIC} AND FILE_TYPE = #{file_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR} ) TB WHERE TB.RNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE API_NEWS_RESULT SET HITS =( SELECT NVL( MAX( HITS ), 0 )+ 1 FROM API_NEWS_RESULT WHERE SEQ_NEWS = #{seq_news, jdbcType = NUMERIC} ) WHERE SEQ_NEWS = #{seq_news, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT ANR.SEQ_NEWS, ANR.SEQ_SEARCH, ANR.TITLE, ANR.LINK, ANR.DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'YYYY') || '/' || DECODE( SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'MM' ), 1, 1 ), '0', SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'MM' ), 2, 1 ), TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'MM' ))|| '/' || DECODE( SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'DD' ), 1, 1 ), '0', SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'DD' ), 2, 1 ), TO_CHAR( ANR.PUB_DATE, 'DD' )) AS PUB_DATE, ANR.NEWS_COMPANY, ANR.LOCAL_LINK_TEXT, ANR.LOCAL_LINK, ANR.CONTENTS, ANR.NEWS_STATUS, ANR.KEYWORD, ANR.YN_USE, ANR.DT_WRT, ANR.DT_FRT, AN.SEARCH_QUERY, (SELECT SEQ_FILE FROM API_NEWS_FILE_INFO ANFI WHERE ANFI.SEQ_NEWS = ANR.SEQ_NEWS AND FILE_TYPE='02') AS SEQ_BODY_FILE FROM API_NEWS_RESULT ANR, API_NEWS AN WHERE ANR.SEQ_SEARCH = AN.SEQ_SEARCH AND ANR.SEQ_NEWS = #{seq_news, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
